EmailTemplate.name: SEVT-202304-HHS-ENT-HIMSS-2023.01b. -Invite 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Big-name health systems share their vision for virtual care
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HIMSS23 April 17-21 Elevating virtual care from tactic to strategic advantage Be sure to stop by Booth #225 to explore the results and potential of virtual care with our experts. Join us at HIMSS23, where several of our clients will share real-world examples of the power of virtual care and strategies for elevating the role of virtual care in your own organization.
Closing the gap to goal for transformational integrated virtual care Tuesday, April 18, 12:00-1:00 p.m. Central Learn more <[[https://www.himss.org/global-conference/session-closing-gap-goal-transformational-integrated-virtual-care-6]]> Hear from our session speakers: Judd Hollander, MD Senior VP, Healthcare Delivery Innovation at Thomas Jefferson University David Fletcher, MBA Associate VP, Telemedicine at Geisinger Increasing access to care for rural and underserved communities Tuesday, April 18, 3:00-4:00 p.m. Central Learn more <[[https://hde.himss.org/global-conference/session-increasing-access-care-rural-and-underserved-communities-6]]> Hear from our session speakers: Shane Fleming, MSN, RN Co-founder & Chief Development Officer, Teledigm Health & Bryan Telemedicine Howard Rubin Chief Information Officer, Evara Health About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
